data.title: Eve Arnold — is this really you?. Or is this the real cost of fame?
data.meta_description: Meet Eve Arnold — queen of Medium musings, master of UX magic, and a reigning champion of Twixxter (my clever blend of Twitter and X. I hope you like it). It was a real mind-bender. It turned my…
data.text:
Meet Eve Arnold — queen of Medium musings, master of UX magic, and a reigning champion of Twixxter (my clever blend of Twitter and X. I hope you like it).

Oh, and she’s got a day job too. Because, well, bills.

But this, made my eyebrows stick to the top of my forehead.

It was a real mind-bender. It turned my stomach inside out and made me spit my morning brew all over my Mac’s screen.

What on earth?

Where did this come from? How? Why? What? Too many questions going through my mind.

Is this the real you, Eve, or is this the real price of fame?

I’ve encountered many twists and turns throughout my blogging journey.

A while back, I wrote an e-book. It was selling like sugar.

Unfortunately, my delight didn’t last long. A clever individual took an interest, downloaded, copied, and replicated my content on an identical website, reaping all the financial rewards.

The alarm bells rang when my sales figures plummeted, and it wasn’t long before a fellow blogger alerted me. I was confused. Why me? How could anyone do such thing?

I wondered.

I learned a lesson that day. It was time to grow up.

You are writing on the internet, baby — a realm where no antivirus can protect you from the predators.
